title: Part A – getRating
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. +1 indicates a point earned and -1 indicates a general or question-specific penalty.

+1 [Skill 3.D] Traverses allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGHbGaaeiBaiaabYgacaqGrbGaaeyDaiaabwgacaqGZbGaaeiD aiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaiaabohaaaa@413E@ (no bounds errors)

Responses will not earn the point if they do not use an element from allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGHbGaaeiBaiaabYgacaqGrbGaaeyDaiaabwgacaqGZbGaaeiD aiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaiaabohaaaa@413E@ inside the loop

+1 [Skill 3.A] Calls getDifficultyLevel MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGebGaaeyAaiaabAgacaqGMbGaaeyA aiaabogacaqG1bGaaeiBaiaabshacaqG5bGaaeitaiaabwgacaqG2b GaaeyzaiaabYgaaaa@4697@

Responses can still earn the point even if they do not call any of these methods on a TriviaQuestion  MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGubGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqG2bGaaeyAaiaabggacaqGrbGaaeyD aiaabwgacaqGZbGaaeiDaiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaiaabckaaaa@442A@ object

Responses will not earn the point if they do not call the method on a variable (e.g., getDifficultyLevel MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGebGaaeyAaiaabAgacaqGMbGaaeyA aiaabogacaqG1bGaaeiBaiaabshacaqG5bGaaeitaiaabwgacaqG2b GaaeyzaiaabYgaaaa@4697@ only, TriviaQuestion.getDifficultyLevel MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGubGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqG2bGaaeyAaiaabggacaqGrbGaaeyD aiaabwgacaqGZbGaaeiDaiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaiaab6cacaqGNb GaaeyzaiaabshacaqGebGaaeyAaiaabAgacaqGMbGaaeyAaiaaboga caqG1bGaaeiBaiaabshacaqG5bGaaeitaiaabwgacaqG2bGaaeyzai aabYgaaaa@5439@ , or TriviaGame.getDifficultyLevel MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGubGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqG2bGaaeyAaiaabggacaqGhbGaaeyy aiaab2gacaqGLbGaaeOlaiaabEgacaqGLbGaaeiDaiaabseacaqGPb GaaeOzaiaabAgacaqGPbGaae4yaiaabwhacaqGSbGaaeiDaiaabMha caqGmbGaaeyzaiaabAhacaqGLbGaaeiBaaaa@504F@ )

+1 [Skill 3.A] Adjusts average using return values from getMostDifficult MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGnbGaae4BaiaabohacaqG0bGaaeir aiaabMgacaqGMbGaaeOzaiaabMgacaqGJbGaaeyDaiaabYgacaqG0b aaaa@44C3@ and getLeastDifficult MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGmbGaaeyzaiaabggacaqGZbGaaeiD aiaabseacaqGPbGaaeOzaiaabAgacaqGPbGaae4yaiaabwhacaqGSb GaaeiDaaaa@459C@

Responses can still earn the point even if they calculate the adjusted average incorrectly

Responses will not earn the point if they call getMostDifficult MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGnbGaae4BaiaabohacaqG0bGaaeir aiaabMgacaqGMbGaaeOzaiaabMgacaqGJbGaaeyDaiaabYgacaqG0b aaaa@44C3@ or getLeastDifficult MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGmbGaaeyzaiaabggacaqGZbGaaeiD aiaabseacaqGPbGaaeOzaiaabAgacaqGPbGaae4yaiaabwhacaqGSb GaaeiDaaaa@459C@ incorrectly

+1 [Skill 3.C] Calculates adjusted average (algorithm point)

Responses can still earn the point even if they:

· adjust the total difficulty by getMostDifficult MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGnbGaae4BaiaabohacaqG0bGaaeir aiaabMgacaqGMbGaaeOzaiaabMgacaqGJbGaaeyDaiaabYgacaqG0b aaaa@44C3@ and getLeastDifficult MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGmbGaaeyzaiaabggacaqGZbGaaeiD aiaabseacaqGPbGaaeOzaiaabAgacaqGPbGaae4yaiaabwhacaqGSb GaaeiDaaaa@459C@ return values incorrectly

· call getMostDifficult MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGnbGaae4BaiaabohacaqG0bGaaeir aiaabMgacaqGMbGaaeOzaiaabMgacaqGJbGaaeyDaiaabYgacaqG0b aaaa@44C3@ or getLeastDifficult MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGmbGaaeyzaiaabggacaqGZbGaaeiD aiaabseacaqGPbGaaeOzaiaabAgacaqGPbGaae4yaiaabwhacaqGSb GaaeiDaaaa@459C@ incorrectly

+1 [Skill 3.C] Returns appropriate rating based on adjusted average

Responses can still earn the point even if they base the rating on an incorrect average

-1 (v) Array/collection access confusion ( [ ] get MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaae4waiaabc cacaqGDbaeaaaaaaaaa8qacaqGGaGaae4zaiaabwgacaqG0baaaa@3BE3@ )

-1 (w) Extraneous code that causes side-effect (e.g., printing to output, incorrect precondition check)

-1 (x) Local variables used but none declared

-1 (y) Destruction of persistent data (e.g., changing value referenced by parameter)

-1 (u) Consistent incorrect identification of allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGHbGaaeiBaiaabYgacaqGrbGaaeyDaiaabwgacaqGZbGaaeiD aiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaiaabohaaaa@413E@

Canonical Solution:
descriptions: Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is less than or equal to 0.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 1.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 2.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 3.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 4.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 5.

title: Part B – isDifficultyIncreasing
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. +1 indicates a point earned and -1 indicates a general or question-specific penalty.

+1 [Skill 3.D] Traverses allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@@411C@ (no bounds error)

Responses will not earn the point if they do not use an element from allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@@411C@ inside the loop

+1 [Skill 3.A] Calls getDifficultyLevel MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4675@ on TriviaQuestion MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42E5@ object (in context of a traversal)

Responses will not earn the point if they do not correctly access an allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@@411C@ element

+1 [Skill 3.D] Compares difficulty levels of adjacent elements in allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@@411C@

Responses can still earn the point even if they:

· have a bounds error

· call getDifficultyLevel MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4675@ incorrectly or call it on an incorrectly accessed allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@@411C@ element

Responses will not earn the point if they do not access one adjacent pair of allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@@411C@ elements

+1 [Skill 3.D] Returns true MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeiDaiaabkhacaqG1bGaaeyzaaaa@39C0@ if difficulty level of each element is less than or equal to difficulty level of each subsequent element; false MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeOzaiaabggacaqGSbGaae4Caiaabwgaaaa@3A8E@ otherwise (algorithm point)

Responses can still earn the point even if they:

· have a bounds error

· call getDifficultyLevel MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4675@ incorrectly

Responses will not earn the point if they return true MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeiDaiaabkhacaqG1bGaaeyzaaaa@39C0@ early or return false MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeOzaiaabggacaqGSbGaae4Caiaabwgaaaa@3A8E@ under incorrect conditions

-1 (v) Array/collection access confusion ( [ ] get MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAB@ )

-1 (w) Extraneous code that causes side-effect (e.g., printing to output, incorrect precondition check)

-1 (x) Local variables used but none declared

-1 (y) Destruction of persistent data (e.g., changing value referenced by parameter)

-1 (u) Consistent incorrect identification of allQuestions MathType@MTEF@5@5@@411C@

Canonical Solution:
descriptions: Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is less than or equal to 0.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 1.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 2.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 3.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 4.

title: Part C – gameLength
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. +1 indicates a point earned and -1 indicates a general or question-specific penalty.

+1 [Skill 3.B] Includes the correct method header: public int gameLength() MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbbjxAHX garmWu51MyVXgaruWqVvNCPvMCG4uz3bqefqvATv2CG4uz3bIuV1wy Ubqee0evGueE0jxyaibaieYlf9irVeeu0dXdh9vqqj=hEeeu0xXdbb a9frFj0=OqFfea0dXdd9vqaq=JfrVkFHe9pgea0dXdar=Jb9hs0dXd bPYxe9vr0=vr0=vqpWqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaabauaaaOqaaa baaaaaaaaapeGaaeiCaiaabwhacaqGIbGaaeiBaiaabMgacaqGJbGa aeiiaiaabMgacaqGUbGaaeiDaiaabccacaqGNbGaaeyyaiaab2gaca qGLbGaaeitaiaabwgacaqGUbGaae4zaiaabshacaqGObWdaiaabIca caqGPaaaaa@4C44@ or

public double gameLength() MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4CCB@

+1 [Skill 3.C] The response identifies properties of the new variable:

· private int MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FFB@ or private double MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42B4@

· maintained in TriviaQuestion MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42E5@ class

Responses can still earn the point even if they do not explicitly specify private MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C84@ visibility

Responses will not earn the point if they:

· do not explicitly specify the enclosing class anywhere in the description

· explicitly specify public MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B85@ visibility

· explicitly specify the variable as static MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B8E@

+1 [Skill 3.B] The response describes how the new variable would be set/modified and accessed:

· public MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B85@ accessor method

· new or modified constructor to initialize the variable OR public MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B85@ mutator method

Responses can still earn the point even if they:

· do not explicitly state the enclosing class

· identify the new variable as being a type other than int MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeyAaiaab6gacaqG0baaaa@38C8@ or double MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B81@

· describe parameter or return type as int MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeyAaiaab6gacaqG0baaaa@38C8@ or double MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B81@ even if not consistent with identified variable type

Responses will not earn the point if they use a parameter or return type other than int MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeyAaiaab6gacaqG0baaaa@38C8@ or double MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B81@ that is not consistent with the identified variable
descriptions: Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is less than or equal to 0.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 1.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 2.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 3.
